metadata.title: USN-7062-1 -- libgsf vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libgsf incorrectly handled certain Compound Document Binary files. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7062-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-gsf-1 - 1.14.47-1ubuntu0.1 libgsf-1-114 - 1.14.47-1ubuntu0.1 libgsf-1-common - 1.14.47-1ubuntu0.1 libgsf-1-dev - 1.14.47-1ubuntu0.1 libgsf-bin - 1.14.47-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
